name: The Conquest - Free Android Strategy Game
name_original: The Conquest - Free Android Strategy Game
description:
Welcome to your Kingdom, my Lord! Your people await you! 


My Lord, I, your loyal servant just came back from the fields of our kingdom - Atlesia.

I hereby report that there are no visible dangers, no enemies at the moment in our Great Country!

Now you must gather resources, construct buildings and drive your kingdom to power because the Darkness is coming.. Produce coins, get rich and grow your civilization. Get prepared...

Now the times have changed 

Your devoted and loyal Android craftsmen have prepared an easy way to drive your kingdom to might and pride!

As the Android devices keep becoming more and more powerful in A.D. 2020, the Master Craftsmen department keeps working tirelessly on updates to make this game more enjoyable than the finest troubadours on Earth.

Also, the engineers are happy to work for you, my Lord, so the game is completely free.

Here is what the pack includes:

- A game! 🏰
- Classic RTS strategy ideas! 💾
- Soon-to-be-added buildings! 🏠
- Building more buildings! ⚒️
- Building even more buildings! ⚒️⚒️⚒️
- Trading (also free!) 💰
- Cute 2D 16Bit style graphics ❤️
- Mysterious updates - enemies to be added soon! ⚔️

Free game - the project I love. I hope you enjoy it guys as much as I do!
